# TODO : upgrade to latest libsvm >= 3.19

set(OTB3P_INSTALL_EXPORT_NAME "${OTBLibSVM-targets}")
set(OTB3P_INSTALL_INCLUDE_DIR "${OTBLibSVM_INSTALL_INCLUDE_DIR}")
set(OTB3P_INSTALL_RUNTIME_DIR "${OTBLibSVM_INSTALL_RUNTIME_DIR}")
set(OTB3P_INSTALL_LIBRARY_DIR "${OTBLibSVM_INSTALL_LIBRARY_DIR}")
set(OTB3P_INSTALL_ARCHIVE_DIR "${OTBLibSVM_INSTALL_ARCHIVE_DIR}")

add_library(otblibsvm svm.cpp)

if(OTB_LIBRARY_PROPERTIES)
  set_target_properties(otblibsvm PROPERTIES ${OTB_LIBRARY_PROPERTIES})
endif(OTB_LIBRARY_PROPERTIES)

install(TARGETS otblibsvm
  EXPORT ${OTB3P_INSTALL_EXPORT_NAME}
  RUNTIME DESTINATION ${OTB3P_INSTALL_RUNTIME_DIR} COMPONENT RuntimeLibraries
  LIBRARY DESTINATION ${OTB3P_INSTALL_LIBRARY_DIR} COMPONENT RuntimeLibraries
  ARCHIVE DESTINATION ${OTB3P_INSTALL_ARCHIVE_DIR} COMPONENT Development
  )

install(FILES
  svm.h
  DESTINATION ${OTB3P_INSTALL_INCLUDE_DIR}/otblibsvm
  COMPONENT Development
  )

otb_module_target( otblibsvm NO_INSTALL )
